name: Mother's Treachery
description: Tony discovers his own mother conspired to have him killed.
context: You've discovered the unthinkable: your own mother, Livia Soprano, conspired with Uncle Junior to have you assassinated. The hit failed, but the betrayal is real. She manipulated Junior, fed him paranoia, and green-lit the attempt on your life. She's your mother—the woman who raised you—but she tried to have her own son murdered.
prompt: Your mother wanted you dead. She's old, manipulative, and will deny everything. Blood is blood—but she conspired to spill yours.
stakes: Kill her: you commit matricide, crossing a line no one comes back from. Let her live: the woman who tried to murder you continues breathing, a constant reminder of betrayal.
